resources.string: \tGitHub is a code hosting platform for version control and collaboration. It lets you and others work together on projects from anywhere.

\t\tIn software engineering, version control is a class of systems responsible for managing changes to computer programs, documents, large web sites, or other collections of information. Version control is a component of software configuration management.

A location for storage, often for safety or preservation. (computing) a storage location for files, such as downloadable software packages, or files in a source control system. A burial vault. (figuratively) A person to whom a secret is entrusted.
